settings.heading: For Orders in the UAE:
settings.desc:
Orders placed before 2:00 PM will be delivered on the same day to Dubai and the next business day to all other Emirates. Orders placed after 2:00 PM will be delivered within 2 business days (excluding Sundays and public holidays).

During Super Sale period due to high demand in order,kindly anticipate slight delays in delivery times.

Delivery times may be affected due to festive holidays. We will send you a confirmation once your order is out for delivery.

settings.heading: Delivery Fee:
settings.desc: Free delivery for purchases above AED 500 and AED 25 delivery fee for purchases under AED 500.

settings.heading: Tracking:
settings.desc:
Once an order is dispatched, a tracking link will be sent to your email by our delivery partner, where you can track the journey of your order.
Track your order here

settings.heading: For queries or assistance
settings.desc: For any queries or assistance required, please get in touch with our customer care team, available on Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) between 9:00 AM to 6:30 PM (UAE time) via phone and email. Alternatively, our customer care team is reachable via WhatsApp daily. Please expect a reply within 1 working day for emails and 3 working hours for WhatsApp.

settings.heading: HOW DO I CHECK I HAVE BEEN REFUNDED THE CORRECT AMOUNT?
